name: One to One
description: One to One is a puzzle game where you control two creatures stuck in a dungeon. One of the creatures can only move vertically, the other only horizontally, so on their own they can't get very far. But everything changes when they Join Together! They can now team up and help each other move where they need to go, open doors and run to the exit. Do you have what it takes to help them escape from the dungeon?
